title: U.K. unveils first ‘smart sidewalk’ offering fast, free Wi-Fi to strollers
text:
U.K. unveils first ‘smart sidewalk’ offering fast, free Wi-Fi to strollers 
Published By: DigitalTrends.com - Today 
One of the U.K.'s leading mobile carriers this week launched the country's first "smart sidewalk," offering free and fast Wi-Fi to anyone in...
